ComicInfo.Penciller: Don Heck,Rich Buckler,Val Mayerik,Don Heck,Rich Buckler,Val Mayerik
ComicInfo.Summary:
Jennifer Kale’s grandfather and his cult of sorcerers are in way over their heads! When an occultist text goes missing, (actually burned by Jennifer), all is chaos in the Nether-Spawn’s realm. Man-Thing's restored to Ted Sallis, the scientist who became the muck monster. Will Sallis abandon his role as Man-Thing when tempted by earthly pleasures?
Where Worlds Collide! - A secret cult believes believes that the Man-Thing is the key to the world's salvation. Meanwhile, Jennifer Kale tries to convince her boyfriend to stay away from the swamp. Ultimately they all end up in the swamp, and reality starts getting really weird! "Mister Black" (reprint) - Who is the mysterious Mister Black, and can he help a young boy desperate to avoid military service?
ComicInfo.Title: Where Worlds Collide!
